intro.title: Welcome to your administrator panel!
intro.text: From here you can manage the data of your website. You can add, edit or delete data. You can do this by clicking on the menu items on the right.

categories.title: Categories
categories.text: Here you can manage the categories of your products.You can add, edit or delete them.

categories.title: Categories
categories.text: Here you can manage the categories that you offer to your customers.
